definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Solid-Phase Synthesis of Enyne and Diyne Precursors.
sentences.chinese: 烯炔和二炔烃前体得固相合成。

sentences.english: The research progress in the prodrugs of antiviral drugs are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 本文对抗病毒前体药物研究进展作介绍。

sentences.english: Scientists at the YVO closely monitor the Yellowstone region for such precursors.
sentences.chinese: 在钒酸钇科学家密切留意这类前体黄石地区。

sentences.english: N-Nitrosamine can be formed in vivo by the interaction of nitrites with secondary amines .
sentences.chinese: 亚硝胺可由其前体物质亚硝酸盐及二级胺在体内合成。

sentences.english: Imageable elements useful as lithographic printing plate precursors are disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 公开了可用作平版印版前体的可成像元件。

sentences.english: Besides, these compounds have the same character that all can be transformed to precursors of polyketide biosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 而且它们都具有转化为聚酮合成前体的共同特征。

sentences.english: Feed stimulating experiments were used to confirm precursors of monascus pigments.
sentences.chinese: 采用刺激实验法确定红曲色素的合成前体。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relativity of thrombus precursor protein in patients with acute cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探过血浆前体蛋白水平与急性脑梗死的相关性。

sentences.english: We have many other cancers in the body and precursor cancers that are also called carcinoma in-situ.
sentences.chinese: 人体有许多种癌而且很多癌症前体也称为原位癌。

sentences.english: Cyanide can serve as precursor for the amide nitrogen of asparagine .
sentences.chinese: 氰化物可以作一个天门冬酰胺的酰胺氮前体。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The prodrug of 4-Aminotetrahydroacridine can be synthesized by this method.
sentences.chinese: 结论该法有助于他克林前体药物的研究。

sentences.english: Glyoxylate rather than ascorbate is an efficient precursor for oxalate biosynthesis in rice.
sentences.chinese: 乙醛酸比抗坏血酸更能作为水稻草酸合成的前体物质。

sentences.english: IDOL can even mediate the degradation of the receptor precursor in the endoplasmic reticulum.
sentences.chinese: 甚至，IDOL能调解内质网中受体前体的降解。
